title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, April 24, 2021
description: Author Anthony Trollope was born this day in London, 1815.  On writing he said, “A small daily task, if it be really daily, will beat the labors of a spasmodic Hercules.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Author Anthony Trollope was born this day in London, 1815.  On writing he said, “A small daily task, if it be really daily, will beat the labors of a spasmodic Hercules.”
